TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HitTestFilterCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HitTestFilterCallback(potentialHitTestTarget As DependencyObject) As HitTestFilterBehavior
type HitTestFilterCallback = delegate of DependencyObject -> HitTestFilterBehavior

param.name: potentialHitTestTarget
param.span: 要進行點擊測試的視覺化部分。

summary.span: 表示回呼方法，指定要在點擊測試處理時略過的視覺化樹狀結構部分。

span.span: Represents the callback method that specifies parts of the visual tree to omit from hit test processing

returns.span: ，表示從點擊測試產生的動作。

span.span: A that represents the action resulting from the hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點擊的測試篩選回呼方法會叫用的所有視覺物件的對應的點擊的測試條件，從您指定的視覺效果，且透過其視覺化樹狀結構的分支遞減。The hit test filter callback method is invoked for all the visual objects that map to the hit test criteria, starting from the visual you specify and descending through its branch of the visual tree. 不過，您可能想要忽略點擊測試結果回呼函式中處理時不感興趣的視覺化樹狀結構特定分支。However, you may want to ignore certain branches of the visual tree that you are not interested in processing in your hit test results callback function. 點擊測試篩選回呼函式的傳回值會決定列舉視覺物件時應採取的動作類型。The return value of the hit test filter callback function determines what type of action the enumeration of the visual objects should take. 例如，如果傳回值， ，您可以從點擊的測試結果的列舉型別移除目前的 visual 物件及其子系。For example, if you return the value, , you can remove the current visual object and its descendants from the hit test results enumeration. 這表示點擊的測試結果回呼方法不會看到這些物件在其列舉型別。This means that the hit test results callback method will not see these objects in its enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 剪除物件的視覺化樹狀結構會減少在點擊測試結果列舉通過期間的處理量。Pruning the visual tree of objects decreases the amount of processing during the hit test results enumeration pass. ![剪除視覺化樹狀結構，使用點擊的測試篩選](~/add/media/filteredvisualtree-01.png "剪除視覺化樹狀結構，使用點擊的測試篩選")![Pruning a visual tree using a hit test filter](~/add/media/filteredvisualtree-01.png "Pruning a visual tree using a hit test filter") 剪除視覺化樹狀結構Pruning a visual tree ## Examples 下列範例示範如何叫用使用值。The following example shows how to invoke by using a value. 也會定義對應的點擊的測試回呼方法。The corresponding hit test callback method is also defined. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#104)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#104)] 下列範例示範如何傳回從點擊的測試篩選回呼方法的值。The following example shows how to return a value from a hit test filter callback method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#106)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#106)]
